form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION FOR IMMIGRANT VISA AND ALIEN REGISTRATION

full_text: Screened by 9/27/2023 FORM APPROVED O.M.B. No. 1405-0015 OPTI FORM 230 (English) (Rev. 6-82) DEPT. OF STATE 50230-105 APPLICATION FOR IMMIGRANT VISA AND ALIEN REGISTRATION INSTRUCTIONS: This form must be filled out in DUPLICATE by typewriter, or if by hand in legible block letters. All questions must be answered, if applicable. Questions which are not applicable should be so marked. If there is insufficient room on the form, answer on separate sheets, in dupli- cate, using the same numbers as appear on the form. Attach the sheets to the forms. DO NOT SIGN this form until instructed to do so by the consular officer. The fee for filing this application for an immigrant visa is $25.00. The fee should be paid in United States dollars or local currency equivalent or by bank draft, when you appear before the consular officer. $170 WARNING: Any false statement or concealment of a material fact may result in your permanent exclusion from the United States. Even though you should be admitted to the United States, a fraudulent entry could be grounds for your prosecution and/or deportation. 1. Family name SIKRI First name Middle name NARAIN DAS 2. Other names used or by which known (If married woman, give maiden name) NARAIN DASS SIKRI 3. Full name in native alphabet (If Roman letters not used) Same as above 4. Date of birth December , 1903 5. Age 6. Place of birth (Day) (Month) (Year) 88 (City or town) (Province) (Country) 01 #12 1903 KOT SULTAN PUNJAB PAKISTAN 7. Nationality 8. Sex 9. Marital status India Male Female Single (never married) Married Widowed Divorced Separated Including my present marriage, I have been married times. 10. Occupation 11. Present address 1105 Sector 19 Retired Government Employee Faridabad, Haryana 121002 12. Name, address, date and place of birth of wife/busband (Give maiden name of wife) 1105 Sector 19 May 10, 1910; Multan, Pakistan PAKISTAN; SUSHILA DEVI RAJPAL; Faridabad, Haryana 121002 Date and place of marriage MULTAN January 23, 1927 13. Names, addresses, dates and places of birth of all children 1. ATAM P. SIKRI; 9431 Wooded Glen Ave., Burke, VA 22015; 12-3-3 Sheikhupura Pakistan 2. OM P. SIKRI, 6 Windmill Court, Silver Spring, MD.20905;29-3-30; Bahawalpur, 3. BRIJ R. SARDANA; 138 La Ronde Ave., Sault Ste Marie, Ont., Canada Pakistan Multan, Pakistan P6B5R6; 14. Person(s) named in 12 and 13 who will accompany or follow 15. Final address in the United States me to the United States Mrs. SUSHILA DEVI SIKRI 9431 Wooded Glen Avenue Dr. ATAM P. SIKRI Burke, VA 22015 16. Person you intend to join (Give name, address, and relationship, 17. Name and address of sponsoring person or organization (If if any) Dr. ATAM P. SIKRI (Son) different from 16) 9431 Wooded Glen Ave Same as # 16 Burke, VA 22015 18. Personal description 19. Marks of identification (a) Color of hair (c) Height White /grey 5 feet 8th inches Cut in right ear lobe. (b) Color of eyes (d) Complexion 20. Purpose in going to the United States Brown Wheatish To live with my Don 21. Length of intended stay (If permanently, so state) 22. Intended port of entry 23. Do you have a ticket to final destination? Permanent Washington, Not yet THIS FORM MAY BE OBTAINED GRATIS AT CONSULAR OFFICES OF THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA NSN 7540-00-149-0919 Previous edition not usable
